QUEST.KILL_VINCENT.NAME: Beauty and the Beast
QUEST.KILL_VINCENT.DESCRIPTION: Kill the owner of 'Eden' nightclub, Hex Folstam, at the request of his girlfriend, Luna.
QUEST.ZED_ACCELERATOR.NAME: Relic of the Past
QUEST.ZED_ACCELERATOR.DESCRIPTION: Bring Zed an old accelerator model. In exchange you will receive a pistol from him.
INTRO_ONE:
Megacity is a place overrun by poverty and feuding gangs, where powerful
	corporations have the most influence. The violence in the streets is a clear sign of
	an impending war. Government operating from behind the secure walls of City Hall are
	trying to combat this, but so far without success. There are rumors that they themselves
	are secretly supporting the chaos to create a New Order on the ruins of the city.
INTRO_TWO: Standing at the edge of the tallest tower...
INTRO_FOUR: Falling and falling for what feels like hours...
